text: Stefan Hengst (born 17 March 1994) is a German slalom canoeist who has competed at the international level since 2011. He won a gold medal in the Extreme K1 event at the 2019 Extreme Canoe Slalom World Championships in Prague. ==World Cup individual podiums== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:95%;" !Season !Date !Venue !Position !Event |- | 2018 || align=right| 8 July 2018 ||align=left| Augsburg || bgcolor=cc9966|3rd || Extreme K1 |- | 2019 || align=right| 8 September 2019 ||align=left| Prague || bgcolor=gold|1st || Extreme K11 |} : 1 World Championship counting for World Cup points ==References== Category:Living people Category:German male canoeists Category:1994 births Category:Medalists at the ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships
title: Stefan Hengst
